results.name: Decimal expansion of the sum n^(-2n) for n=1 through infinity.
comment: This number is the sum of the inverses of the terms in the sequence A062206.
results.author: Christopher M. Tomaszewski (cmt1288(AT)comcast.net), Jul 26 2003
ext: More terms from _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Mar 23 2010
